value.name: A year after George Floyd’s murder, only a few of Texas lawmakers’ police reform measures appear likely to become law
value.description: A year ago, longtime Houston resident George Floyd was murdered by a Minneapolis police officer. Texas Gov. Greg Abbott promised his death would not be in vain.

value.name: North Texans Reflect On Murder Of George Floyd 1 Year Later
value.description: After people watched the video, we knew people in our community, black and white, were hurting and scared. We didn’t want them to feel they were alone,” Lowry Manders said.

value.name: Why Do Police Keep Shooting Into Moving Cars?
value.description: Two years later, outside Dallas, Officer Roy Oliver shot and killed Jordan Edwards, a 15-year-old boy riding in the passenger seat of a car that police tried to prevent from leaving a party.
